metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7449 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The TIFFGetField function in coders/tiff.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.24 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) viaa file containing an "unterminated" string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7449` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.25-1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.25-1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.25-1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.25-1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.25-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.25-1').
